ygData.subject: RE: Bards vs Clerics in melee
ygData.msgSnippet: ... lol.  blame it on the god of hate.  because we all really must hate each to keep wanting to kill everyone.  Make a friend, slay a gnoll. A quote from a not
ygData.messageBody:
>Somehow we lost the "effectiveness against any monster" part
>and it became bard vs. cleric. I dunno how it became a melee-only
>contest too, maybe because I was comparing defensive melee skills
>and someone dropped the "defensive" part.

lol. blame it on the god of hate. because we all really
must hate each to keep wanting to kill everyone. Make a
friend, slay a gnoll.

A quote from a not so wise creature, 'Ugh. My brother will
get you. You will be stain on his feets.' Then followed
up with, 'You beat me. You am strong little thing.'

Harmonic Distortion, 37th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
